altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

description.en:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
description.fr:
Était-ce un ange, un démon ou autre chose qui m'a ressuscité ?
Jisoo Han, un major de troisième année en chirurgie générale, a perdu la vie en raison de sa personnalité droite. Cependant, grâce aux bonnes actions qu'il a faites dans sa vie, il a été ressuscité dans le corps d'un homme mort qui a été tué par des bandits de montagne. Mais ce corps… Est-ce le corps d'un grand chirurgien légendaire ?! Maintenant, dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes de guerres et de héros [CE 200]. Jisoo essaie de survivre et de se tenir debout en tant que chirurgien légendaire ……
Le voyage inattendu et extraordinaire d'un jeune chirurgien, tombé dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes, a commencé !
description.ko:
정의로운 성격 때문에 전문의는 커녕, 목숨까지 잃은 일반외과 전공 3년차 한진수.

천사인가, 악마인가, 아님 알 수 없는 시스템인가.
평소 쌓은 선행 덕분에 부활의 기회를 얻게 된다.

산적 떼에게 죽은 몸으로 부활하게 된 한진수.
그런데 이 몸이 전설의 명의名醫 화타?!

전란이 끊임없는 영웅들의 시대, 혼란한 후한 말.
한진수, 그는 후한 말 명의名醫 화타로서 우뚝 서려 한다…….

<삼국지연의> 속 세상에 떨어진 젊은 외과의사가 펼치는 
기상천외한 모험이 시작된다!"

altTitles.ja: 範馬刃牙

altTitles.en: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)

description.en:
The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited!

Hanma Yuujirou, the world's strongest creature, vs. Hanma Baki, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

title.en: Gyaru ni koisuru 5 byou mae Anthology Comics

altTitles.ja: ギャルに恋する５秒前 アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.en: 5 seconds before falling in love with a gyaru - Anthology Comics

description.en:
"You’re bound to fall in love when a gal is kind to you!". Despite dressing flamboyantly with a smidgin of lewdness sprinkle in, these gals occasionally show a pure side that will leave you mesmerized and-?

This is an Anthology collection of 6 chapters:
-Don’t seduce me, Sakihara-san! (by Kazawa Youhei)
-Kiyokawa-san is definitely a gyaru! (by saku)
-The gyaru childhood friend wants to give a warm welcome! (by Urano Ritsu)
-The gyaru likes ramen! (by Hidari Ude)
-Munching ♡ Kanna-chan ~A recipe for making gyaru fall in love with you~ (by Noki Kuzuri)
-The inexperienced gyaru asks for her teacher’s lessons (by Kamon Shoumi)

Cover illustration: Kazawa Youhei

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
バキ道

description.en: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.
description.ru: Продолжение серии манги Бойца Баки. После "победы" над воскрешённым "богом меча" Миямото Мусаси в этот раз история столкнёт главных персонажей с потомком "бога сумо" и его бандой сумоистов.
description.tr: 2000 yıldan fazla bir süre sonra, Nomi no Sukune'nin halefi doğuyor. Bu kez, Baki sumo tanrısına meydan okuyacak.

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

altTitles.ja: ハルのレジスタ

description.en:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team’s play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

description.en: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

A sweet overnight vigil with His Majesty S! A pet contract with an obsessed demon king, etc… The other world life is full of doting♂ flags..!? Lovey-dovey in full bloom♪ The second anthology of Another World x Doting BL! 

Cover: TAKAYAMA Shinobu 

Included works:

2. I Was Already Married When I Woke Up [Art: Homerun Ken] [Story: as]

4. I Was Drinking Myself to Death Because of My Unrequited Love For a Quiet Childhood Friend, and I Was Doted On For a Night By an Adventurer Resembling My Crush [Art: AOI Kurage] [Story: Amagi] 
5. Please Forgive Me Demon King [Art: Hakkoumame] [Story: Hinya]

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ファミレスで、クラスのあの子と。

altTitles.en: After School, at a Family Restaurant at Night, With That Girl From My Class

altTitles.pt-br: Depois da escola, em um restaurante familiar à noite, com aquela garota da minha turma

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
description.pt-br: É divertido e me sinto confortável com esse tipo de tempo. O restaurante familiar depois da escola é o único lugar onde posso me sentir à vontade, pois não tenho lugar em casa devido ao novo casamento dos meus pais. No restaurante da família, conheço uma colega de classe, Kazemiya Kohaku, que é uma linda garota solitária que não se dá bem com ninguém. Ela também parece estar tendo problemas com sua família. Daquele dia em diante, o tempo chato no restaurante da família tornou-se um momento agradável para reclamar com Kohaku. No restaurante da família, depois da escola, os dois começam a procurar um motivo para não voltarem para casa hoje...

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

description.en: This manga depicts the one-year gap in the story when Harumichi Bouya leaves Suzuran Boys High School until Hana Tsukishima arrives at Toaru City.
description.ja:
不良漫画の金字塔『クローズ』『WORST』最新スピンオフ!!

坊屋春道が街から去り、月島花はまだ「圏外」にいる、そんな時期の戸亜留市で、不良の歴史に刻まれなかった熱き男たちがいた。
名もなきカラスたちの疾走する青春群像劇!!

description.en: After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the prince’s heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!

altTitles.ja: 焼いてるふたり

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

title.en: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!

altTitles.en: The Elegant Life of the Exiled Hero: When I Became Free, I Also Gained My Beloved Angel!

altTitles.ja: 追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihō Yūsha no Yūgana Seikatsu (Slow Life) ～Jiyū ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!～

description.en:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden

I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Shadow Side Story

description.en:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun: I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site"

altTitles.id: Aku Menjadi Penyihir Terkuat di Dunia: Aku Akan Hidup dengan Bebas di Dunia di Mana Hanya Aku yang Bisa Mengakses "Situs Panduan"

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

title.en: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihousaremashita ~Ore no Mahou ga Yabasugite, Bijo to Mazoku ni Kakomarerun da ga!?~

altTitles.ja: 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。～俺の魔法がヤバすぎて、美女と魔族に囲まれてるんだが！？～

altTitles.en: When I Put up the Strongest Barrier in the Country, It Became Too Peaceful and I Was Banished. They Did Know That That Barrier Isn't Permanent, Right?

altTitles.es-la: Cuando levanté la barrera más fuerte del país, se volvió demasiado pacífico y me desterraron. ¿Sabían que esa barrera no es permanente, verdad?

description.en: A young man, Shield, can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon. Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?
description.ja:
強固なバリアに覆われた大国ヘレナは、魔物からも守られて繁栄の一途をたどっていた。そんなバリアを張ったシールド・レイアレスは宮廷魔法師として高い地位を築いてはいたが、バリア魔法しか使えないと周囲からは見下されていた。そんな矢先、シールドの婚約パーティーでいきなり国家反逆罪で追放されてしまう…!

国を追われて金も地位も失い、人生のドン底に落ちたシールドだったが、彼が唯一使えるバリア魔法は常人離れしたとんでもないものだった! そんな規格外の力を求めて、ドラゴンや異国の美女たち、終いには凶悪な魔族たちにまで狙われていく…!?

title.en: The Cup of Vengeance Is in Your Hands

description.en: Princess Eudith’s story begins when her cruel brother, the king, sells her off to the neighboring kingdom to marry the queen’s powerless stepson, Prince Franz. Eudith becomes a pawn in the queen’s plot to discredit Franz and place her biological son, Krald, on the throne. Desperate, Eudith attempts to end her misery but wakes up on the day of her fateful journey. Armed with knowledge and experience from her past life, Eudith seizes the chance for revenge by helping Prince Franz take his rightful place on the throne. Will Eudith succeed in her revenge and find happiness?

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
description.es: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?
description.es-la: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?

altTitles.ja: 恋する暴君

description.en: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

title.en: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu

altTitles.ja: 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです

altTitles.en: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless

altTitles.ko: 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다

altTitles.zh: 只有无职是不会辞去的

altTitles.zh-hk: 只有無職是不會辭去的

description.en:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken.

On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal… and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20…. 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job… but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process. … Which I do at 400 times faster than normal.

As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
description.ja: 就活中に事故で死にそうになった楠一之丞は異世界に転移。さらに女神の手違いにより一之丞は常人の400倍のスピードで成長する能力を授かった。あまりの成長速度に、一之丞は無職のまま異世界生活を始める。

altTitles.ja: クベーラ

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ja: 愛妻の裏アカ

altTitles.vi: Tài khoản bí mật của vợ yêu

description.vi:
Yamada Sosuke, người có một cô con gái đang học tiểu học, tình cờ xem được đoạn video ghi lại cảnh người có vẻ là vợ anh đang quan hệ t.ì.n.h d.ụ.c trong một tài khoản nặc danh. Hơn nữa, đoạn video còn được quay tại trường tiểu học mà con gái anh đang theo học.
Chủ tài khoản bí mật có thực sự là vợ anh không? Và cô ấy đang ngoại tình với ai?

altTitles.ja: 僕たちは繁殖をやめた

description.en:
The third year university student Shin Momotari dreams of creating the greatest movie, and one day he has a chance encounter with Hitomi Oosako, a girl beautiful enough to be mistaken as an actress. And, it just so happens that she is an entering student at the university Shin attends.

Guided by fate, the two of them gradually begin to fall for each other. However, there is something that neither of them know. The one they've fallen in love with is related to them by blood, their sibling.

And so opens the curtain on a pure and forbidden love story, woven by the two who must never be together.
description.pt:
Quero fazer o melhor filme de todos! Foi abraçando esse sonho que o estudante universitário Momotari Shin encontrou a linda atriz, segundo ele, Osako Hitomi.   
Ela, de alguma forma, era caloura na mesma universidade que Shin frequenta. Levados pelo destino, Shin e Hitomi se atraem. Contudo, havia algo que os dois não sabiam.  
O fato de que eram irmãos de sangue. Começa uma história de um inocente amor proibido de um casal conectado por laços inseparáveis.

altTitles.ja: 新装版 WORST

description.en: Worst but New Edition
description.vi: Liên minh Kurotaki sụp đổ, quyền lực của King Joe ở Housen dần bị mai một, Zetton bại trận trước Guriko đưa Suzuran vào thế hỗn loạn, Vũ Trang Chiến Tuyến ngày càng mạnh mẽ và bền bỉ... Trước tình cảnh đó thì ở Toaru bất ngờ xuất hiện một chàng trai đến từ ngoại thành mang tên Tsukishima Hana - kẻ mang ước mơ trở thành thủ lĩnh đầu tiên của toàn bộ Cao Trung Nam Sinh Suzuran vốn luôn hỗn loạn!

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.ja: トモダチゲーム

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.tr: Katagiri Yuichi, arkadaşların paranın öneminden daha önemli olduğuna inanır, ancak yetersiz fonların zorluklarını da bilir. Lise gezisine gitmeyi taahhüt ettiği dört en iyi arkadaşıyla birlikte gitmeyi planlar ve bu yüzden para biriktirmek için çalışır. Ancak, sınıfın topladığı paranın hepsi çalınır! Şüphe, Yuichi'nin arkadaşları Sawaragi Shiho ve Shibe Makoto üzerine düşer.Kısa bir süre sonra, beşi kaçırılır ve garip bir odada, kısa ömürlü bir animenin karakteriyle uyanırlar. Görünüşe göre, onlardan biri büyük bir borcu ödemek için bir "arkadaşlık oyunu" na girmiştir. Ancak kimdi ve neden böyle bir borcu vardı? Sınıftan parayı çalıp oyunun giriş ücretini ödeyebilirler miydi? Katagiri ve en iyi arkadaşları, birbirlerine olan inançlarını test edecek veya yok edecek psikolojik oyunlarda başarılı olmak zorunda kalacaklar.
description.vi: Katagiri Yuichi tin rằng bạn bè quan trọng hơn tiền bạc, nhưng cậu cũng hiểu rõ sự khó khăn khi túng thiếu. Cậu làm việc chăm chỉ để tiết kiệm tiền cho chuyến đi dã ngoại thời trung học, vì cậu đã hứa với bốn người bạn thân của mình rằng tất cả sẽ cùng đi. Tuy nhiên, sau khi gom đủ tiền, toàn bộ quỹ lớp bị trộm mất! Sự nghi ngờ đổ lên đầu hai người bạn của Yuichi, Sawaragi Shiho và Shibe Makoto. Ngay sau đó, cả 5 người bị bắt cóc, và thấy mình tỉnh dậy trong 1 căn phòng kỳ lạ, cùng 1 nhân vật hoạt hình. Có vẻ như, một trong số 5 người đã đẩy bọn họ vào "trò chơi tình bạn" nhằm mong gỡ lại món tiền nào đó. Nhưng đó là ai, và tại sao bọn họ lại phải mang nợ? Phải chăng đã có kẻ trộm tiền của lớp để trả tiền được vào trò chơi này? Katagiri và những người bạn thân của mình buộc phải thắng trong trò chơi. Sẽ là bài kiểm tra tình bạn, hay phá hủy niềm tin giữa bọn họ?  Tên tiếng việt: Friends game - Trò chơi tình bạn
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いのお食事処

description.en:
A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

title.en: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World

altTitles.en: A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family

altTitles.pt-br: Usando minhas Habilidades Culinárias no Murim

description.en:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?
description.pt-br:
Com o sonho de se tornar o melhor chef da culinária chinesa, nosso protagonista se vê inexplicavelmente transportado para a Dinastia Song na China! No entanto, ao acordar, ele descobre que não possui nenhuma habilidade em artes marciais. Tudo o que resta são as técnicas culinárias que ele dominou em sua vida anterior. Surpreendentemente, esses pratos… recebem uma resposta extremamente positiva!

Ele pode, com uma única tigela de Jjajangmyeon, realmente conquistar o mundo marcial? Ele será capaz de cativar as Planícies Centrais com seu Jjajangmyeon e levar uma segunda vida bem-sucedida nesta era?

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

altTitles.ja: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双

description.en:
A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で水の大精霊やってます。

description.en:
When Nagi Saejima, a carefree high school student, wakes up from a doze, he became a lake in a different world!? Nagi, w finds out that he is the "Great Spirit of Water" whose main body is the lake, heals those who suffer from injuries and diseases with the power that dwells in himself. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and summoned by a boy. That encounter will greatly change the fate of Nagi.
Alphapolis's 2nd Next Generation Fantasy Cup "Unique Character Award" winner, long-awaited comicalize!! "Since I was revered, I have to save it with the power of God's healing."

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
The second season of Cho Seok's Tidal Universe masterpiece, Planetary Human. So… prepare yourself to be mindfucked.

altTitles.ja: 黄泉のツガイ

altTitles.fr: Tsugai : Daemons of the Shadow Realm

description.en:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)
description.ja: 山奥の小さな村落に住む少年のユルは、野鳥を狩り、大自然の中で静かに暮らしていた。しかしユルの双子の妹のアサは、何故か村の奥にある牢の中で「おつとめ」を果たしているという。それはまるで幽閉されているかのように…。穏やかな村に浮かぶ不自然な謎、この村に隠された秘密とは一体…!?
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

title.en: Koi De Tokeru Girudo Za Lily

altTitles.ja: 恋でとけるギルド・ザ・リリー

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Tan Chảy Trong Hội Lily

description.en:
Former Host No.1 – Asuka Loses Her Throne To Rookie Kyouji!

Asuka, who has always held the No.1 Host position for many years, was suddenly usurped by Kyouji, a brand new rookie, in a spectacular way. Determined to regain the No.1 position, Asuka tries her best but continuously fails, even having to ask Kyouji for help to solve the problem...

Newly emerging typical bad boy No.1 vs Arrogant good boy former No.1 - 
Romantic night love story for crazy fans officially begins!
